Articles.Content: Hi everyone, I'm just a regular player wanting to join the forums with about 380 hours under my belt. I've been lurking around the forums here for a while and I really wanted to vote on some of the threads here.

Welcome, weldome!

Im Jeb.

Heres a quick tour of the forums.

you'll find the dev posts in the top two threads.

you already know the welcome aboard thread.

you can talk about ksp in thread below this.

then you have help sections, then challenges.

Now by far the best bit, the spacecraft exchange, you'll find great ships here.

then missions.

Next up is support and suggestions.

Then mods, and games.
Hello Stryde, welcome to the community. Interactions on the forums add a whole other level of enjoyment to the game for me. Enjoy your stay!
